title: Dynamic Programming
content:
# Dynamic Programming

![](image-kksen5sw.png)

Obviously, the right is much better. So much repeated work on the left. 

Just count up, it's wayyyy faster.

:::note Dynamic programming
Solve subproblems from smaller to larger, storing up solutions.
:::
